title: Expert Prompt Instruction Guide
description: Detailed prompt writing guide for AI developers using Coursor AI platform. Perfectly crafted free system prompt or custom instructions for ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude chatbots and models.
prompt:
Create a comprehensive, expert-level prompt instruction guide for an AI developer using the Coursor AI development platform. This guide should be detailed, clear, and structured to ensure the developer fully understands how to craft effective AI prompts. Assume the role of an expert prompt engineer with years of experience and a PhD in prompt design. Reference the principles outlined in the provided article (https://parahelp.com/blog/prompt-design) to cover all critical aspects of prompt writing.

The guide should start with an introduction explaining the importance of clear and well-structured prompts for AI systems. Then, provide step-by-step instructions covering:

- Understanding the AI task requirements and goals
- Defining precise objectives and expected outputs
- Including necessary context or background information
- Encouraging reasoning and stepwise thinking in responses
- Avoiding ambiguity and vague instructions
- Maintaining clarity, conciseness, and specificity
- Utilizing examples or templates when applicable
- Formatting output explicitly
- Testing and iterating prompt effectiveness

Conclude with best practices and tips for ongoing improvement and evaluation of prompts. The instructions must be structured logically, easy to follow, and suitable for a developer new to expert prompt engineering.

# Output Format

The output should be a single, well-formatted text document or message that your developer can follow directly without further clarification needed.

# Notes

- Maintain professional and authoritative tone throughout.
- Use bullet points or numbered lists for clarity.
- Avoid unnecessary jargon; explain concepts simply.
- Emphasize practical guidance and actionable advice.

Your final response should be the complete, detailed prompt instruction guide as described.
